origin.bonusorigins.witch.name: Witch
origin.bonusorigins.witch.description: Top tier alchemists, with impressive brewing abilities.
power.bonusorigins.potion_drink.name: Altered Metabolism
power.bonusorigins.potion_drink.descript: The effects of consumed potions is amplified.
power.bonusorigins.potion_throw.name: Efficient Dosage
power.bonusorigins.potion_throw.descript: You can get much more out of your thrown potions.
power.bonusorigins.heavy_shield.name: Cumbersome
power.bonusorigins.heavy_shield.descript: You find shields too heavy and awkward to use.
power.bonusorigins.frail.name: Frail
power.bonusorigins.frail.description: You have 2 less hearts of health than humans.
power.bonusorigins.ignite.name: Ignite
power.bonusorigins.ignite.description: You can ignite yourself, providing increased damage and a gentle decent.
power.bonusorigins.weak_armour.name: Non-solid body
power.bonusorigins.weak_armour.descripti: You cannot wear armour that is too heavy, as it interferes with your incorporable form.
power.bonusorigins.burn_in_sunlight.name: Photoallergic
power.bonusorigins.burn_in_sunlight.desc: You begin to burn in daylight if you are not invisible.
power.bonusorigins.transparent.name: Translucent
power.bonusorigins.transparent.descripti: While phantomized, your skin is translucent.
